remarks: Lemma for ~ mdsymi .  Lemma 4(i) of [Maeda] p. 168.  Note that Maeda's 1965 definition of dual modular pair has reversed arguments compared to the later (1970) definition given in Remark 29.6 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 130, which is the one that we use.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
